ygData.subject: re: charismatic car
ygData.msgSnippet: ... CCC does indeed raise your faction to amiable for the duration of your visit to that zone.  However, you cannot click every NPC you see and bring your
ygData.messageBody:
>It works by temporarily raising you faction with the mob
>type selected. That's why playing it more that once doesn't
>do anything, however this begs the question if you do it to
>several different factioned mobs do you become Mr. Popularity
>I haven't experimented with it really, but I'm hoping someone
>else maybe knows.

CCC does indeed raise your faction to amiable for the duration
of your visit to that zone. However, you cannot click every NPC
you see and bring your faction to amiable, you can only affect one
faction at a time. Attempting to CCC another faction, reduces the
first CCC you did back to it's normal level. You can test this
in any city on guards and merchants, since each belong to different
factions. Once you do CCC it's there until you zone.


Harmonic Distortion, 35th hell.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
